Articles.Content:
Whoa. That is a Great Post!

"Being Smart, Does not mean you are wise, but being wise also means you are smart."
Could I recommend that the thread owner alphabetize the list. Please. Pretty Please.

PGHampton: They're in order of update. It's easy to copy-paste and sort, or to Ctrl-F for modname; you can't ctrl-F for date-updated, and this way people who've already been looking at the list can just look at the bottom of each to see what's new.

That said, it having been a well over a month since .25 was released, you're probably going to want to use the Community Mods and Plugins Library since that's a much more complete list; this thread has pretty much served its purpose.
